io.fluo.api.client

Interface TransactionBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SnapshotBase
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Transaction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TracingTransaction, TransactionImpl, TypedTransaction, TypedTransactionBase

    public interface TransactionBase
extends SnapshotBase
    Enables users to read and write to a Fluo table at certain point in time. TransactionBase extends SnapshotBase to include methods for writing to Fluo.

    • Method Summary
